Package org.opentcs.access

Interfaces and classes for accessing the kernel from outside, for instance from a remote client or a communication adapter.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Kernel
    Declares the methods the openTCS kernel must implement which are accessible both to internal components and remote peers (like graphical user interfaces).
    LocalKernel
    Declares the methods the openTCS kernel must provide which are not accessible to remote peers.
    SharedKernelClient
    Provides access to a shared kernel.
    SharedKernelProvider
    Pools access to a kernel for multiple clients.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationItemTO Deprecated
    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.
    TCSKernelStateEvent
    Instances of this class represent events emitted by/for kernel state changes.
    TCSModelTransitionEvent
    Instances of this class represent events emitted when the kernel loads a model.
    TCSNotificationEvent
    Instances of this class represent events emitted by/for notifications being published.
    TravelCosts
    This class is used for calculating the costs to travel from one location to another.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Kernel.State
    The various states a kernel instance may be running in.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CredentialsException
    Thrown when there are insufficient user permissions to perform an operation.
    KernelException
    An exception thrown by the openTCS kernel.
    KernelRuntimeException
    A runtime exception thrown by the openTCS kernel.
    UnsupportedKernelOpException
    Thrown when there are insufficient user permissions to perform an operation.

Package org.opentcs.access Description

Interfaces and classes for accessing the kernel from outside, for instance from a remote client or a communication adapter.
